group_1.textLeft: I think it’s safe to say that the one we’re@currently dealing with...

group_1.textRight: That one girl did have a coat, but she saved me.
Did we get the wrong idea from what we@researched?

group_1.textLeft: That would make for a rather strange timeline...
For now, perhaps it’s best to assume that@the girl who saved you is unrelated.

group_1.textRight: I bet that’s the same girl I met, too.@My bad on that...

group_1.textLeft: Alright, I’ve revised our notes on@the Memory Ripper Girl.

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Rumor of the Memory Ripper Girl: Kamihama]
[textBlack:・Location: Back alley (time unknown)]@[textBlack:・The sound of a bell is heard from somewhere.]@[textBlack:・Appearance: More than one form.]@[textBlack:・It has only spread recently.]

[textBlack:・Regarding names]@[textBlack:   You will be asked your name.]@[textBlack:   If you answer, the knife will slash you,]@[textBlack:   but you will be unharmed.]@[textBlack:   Your memory will be ripped apart.]@[textBlack:   You shouldn’t answer, but you have to.]

[textBlack:・Matsuri and Arisa encountered it.]@[textBlack:   Answering with their names made it change form]@[textBlack:・Result of being cut...]@[textBlack:   Arisa: lost part of her memory]@[textBlack:   Matsuri: got memories she shouldn't have?]

[textBlack:・"She's been absorbed"]@[textBlack:   What Chisato said to explain why]@[textBlack:   Kanoko wasn't there to Arisa,]@[textBlack:   right before being absorbed and]@[textBlack:   assimilated herself]

group_1.textLeft: Yep, nice and easy to understand.

group_1.textRight: As for other information...@There’s Aimi’s note and that’s it, right?

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Story spread to everyone by some kind of Familiar(?)]@[textBlack: Seems to have magic but isn’t a Familiar?]

group_1.textLeft: This could potentially explain why@a mere rumor...
is attacking people in real life.

group_1.textRight: So there’s a Witch behind it?

group_1.textLeft: I can’t say for sure...but it’s possible.

group_1.textRight: Why can’t you say for sure?

group_1.textLeft: She wrote that it’s unclear whether@it’s a Familiar or not,
and Magical Girls have magic signatures as well...
There’s other possibilities left, so@I can’t say for sure yet.
I believe that this note describes something@very close to the truth.
How about we visit the place where Aimi@got this information?

group_1.textRight: The shopping district! Agreed!@I was on my way there in the first place, after all.
I think that’d be good, too!
Yeah... It’s about the memories I got back.
